alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 9:31AM CST until February 21 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Dallas Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...From Monday morning to late Monday night. * IMPACTS...At 66.0 feet, Farm and pasturelands in the area will flood and cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 61.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Monday morning, then to a crest of 66.1 feet early Monday afternoon. It is then forecast to quickly fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
